infos.title: Knight of Iron Defense
infos.story: This upright and righteous man protects Orvel as one of its knights. Many people consider him a dependable defender of Orvel, but due to his lack of interest in wealth and success, his actual rank within the order has never been very high. He grew up together with Kasel and Frey in the same orphanage, and he loves his land as the home of those precious to him. He recently volunteered to join the expedition to investigate the King's Plains.

1.name: Cut Ground
1.description: Leaps into the air and deals ??? P.DMG to enemies in range, stunning them for 5 sec.

2.name: Shield Strike
2.description: Deals ??? P.DMG proportional to Clause's P.DEF to enemies in range and knocks them back. Reduces Hit enemies' All DEF by 30% and ATK Spd by 500 for 20 sec, respectively. When Clause successfully blocks an attack, reduces this Skill's Cooldown by 0.5 sec.

3.name: Guardian Shield
3.description: Increases All allies' P.DEF by ???, P.Crit Resistance by 300, and reduces P.DMG they take by 25% for 20 sec.

4.name: Vow of Knights
4.description: Upon blocking, deals ??? P.DMG to frontal enemies, decreases ATK of affected targets by 20% for 8 sec and recovers own Mana by 300. When an ally excluding self takes DMG, increases all allies' P.DEF by 20% and P.Crit Resistance by 200 for 5 sec. This effect only activates once every 10 sec.

dark.effect: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, the skill has a 100% chance to draw the target in.

light.effect: Target takes 25% increased All DMG for 10 sec.

dark.effect: Increases P.Block Chance by 250 for the duration of Skill.

light.effect: Increases All DMG the hit target takes by 20% for 10 sec and has 10 sec Cooldown.

dark.effect: At the beginning of each battle, increases ATK of all allies by 15%. This effect can be stacked up to max 3 times and is irremovable.

uw.name: The Guardian, Exian
uw.description: Upon casting an active skill 3 times, increases P.DEF and ATK for all allies by (0) for 15 sec. ATK boost is doubled for the ally with the highest ATK.
uw.story: A sword and shield set engraved with various Runes and infused with ancient magic. These legendary items are said to have been created eons ago by an ancient dragon named Exian, using its own scales. As one of the royal treasures of Orvel, the sword is bestowed only to the knight of the most honorable principles. Its wielder shall serve as the defender of the kingdom and its people, and the protector of life.

1.name: Cape of Justice
1.description: [Cut Ground] Increases All DMG target receives by (0) for 10 sec, and recovers own Mana by 400 per every hit enemy.
1.story: A ceremonial cape used on special occasions of Orvelia. Ever since it was bestowed upon Clause on the day he was knighted, it reminds Clause of his early resolutions. Whenever he wants to quit, exhausted from all the battles, Clause would bring it out and contemplate on it. Young Kasel used to watch Clause do this and dream of becoming a knight.

2.name: Firm Determination
2.description: [Shield Strike] Reduces All Crit Resistance of the affected enemy by 500 and Crit Chance by (0) for 10 sec.
2.story: Old wooden shield of the knight of the Iron Wall. It's a precious shield that Clause used when he first started training. He has since engraved the names of his deceased comrades in order to remember his determination as a guardian knight. Each time he pushes away enemies with the shield, the knight's firm determination helps him tap into power beyond his limits.

3.name: Guardian Knight Insignia
3.description: [Guardian Shield] Upon activation, removes negative effects on self, and DEF boost is increased by (0).
3.story: Rune of the Orvel Guardian Knights. A Gold Lion Rune that is given to knights when they first join the Guardian Knights, along with the vow that they will give their lives to protect the kingdom. The rune from the Guardian Knights bolsters a knight's iron will and loyalty, increasing the effectiveness of the Guardian Shield.

4.name: Mittens
4.description: [Vow of Knights] Upon activation, heals HP by 2% of Max HP, and increases own P.DEF by (0) for 5 sec.
4.story: A pair of gloves that Clause cherishes the most. Young Kasel and Frey gave him these when Clause was ordained a knight during a particularly cold winter. Although it wasn't knitted perfectly, each of them knitted each piece with their initials engraved on it.

sw.requirement: Charges up upon using Skills 5 times.
sw.description: Summons the Soul of The Guardian, Exian, increasing P.DEF of all allies by 70% for 12 sec. For the duration of Skill, normal attacks stun the target for 1 sec and reduce its All DEF by 7% for 5 sec. The DEF Reduction effect can be stacked up to max 5 times.

advancement.1: Upon activation, reduces P.DMG the ally with the highest ATK takes by 80% and increases that ally's ATK by 100% of Clause's P.DEF for 12 sec. This effect is irremovable.
advancement.2: Upon activation, increases DMG the ally with the highest ATK deals by 15% for 12 sec. Clause's normal attacks increase All DMG the target takes by 20% for 5 sec.

sw.story:
Exian was always there with Clause. Exian saw how Clause swore to protect the ones precious to him, how he refused to be discouraged even facing loss, and how he cried in despair after losing his family. Exian always regarded Clause's conviction and courage highly, and whenever Clause cried and directed his fury, Exian did the same. Ultimately, Exian resonated with Clause's soul and unleashed its power.
'Guardian knight, I shall guard you from now on, so that your conviction wil never break!'
Exian's power, awakened through ancient magic and ironclad will, shall accompany the unbreakable knight in his journey, even if the path is perilous and twisted...
